Oct. 5, 2019 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Ysgol Maes y Gwendraeth, Cefneithin, Cross Hands Best instrumentalist - Flugel - Amy Hackett - Newport Borough Brass Band Winning Conductor Trophy - Robin Hackett - Newport Borough Brass Band Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 11, 2019, 5:45 p.m. July 4, 2020, 11:05 p.m.
1 Newport Borough Band Robin Hackett
2 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
3 Abertillery & District Youth Joshua Ruck
4 Crwbin Silver Band Andrew Jones
5 Ammanford Silver Band Glyn Rhys Davies
6 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
